tasks.name: Complete Google Search Console Setup and Property Verification
tasks.description: Finalize Google Search Console setup with domain property verification to enable search performance monitoring and indexing control. This foundational step unlocks all other Google search optimization capabilities including sitemap submission, URL inspection, and performance monitoring.
tasks.notes: Domain verification preferred as it covers all subdomains and protocols automatically. Verification may take 24-48 hours to complete. Keep verification credentials secure.

relatedFiles.description: Directory for HTML verification file upload if DNS method unavailable
Root layout for HTML meta tag verification if needed

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Access Google Search Console at search.google.com/search-console
2. Complete domain property verification for memospark.live using preferred method (DNS TXT record recommended)
3. Verify green checkmark appears and property is active
4. Configure email notifications for critical issues
5. Document verification method for future reference
6. Test access to dashboard and core features
tasks.verificationCriteria: Google Search Console property successfully verified with green checkmark. Dashboard accessible with property data visible. Email notifications configured. Verification method documented for future reference.
tasks.analysisResult: MemoSpark requires systematic SEO optimization to achieve Google search visibility and indexing. The application has sophisticated existing SEO infrastructure including AI-optimized sitemap configuration, comprehensive SEO components, structured data schemas, and advanced robots.txt. The plan focuses on completing critical setup phases, leveraging existing infrastructure, and implementing performance optimizations to achieve immediate indexing and long-term search visibility while maintaining excellent user experience.
tasks.summary: Google Search Console successfully set up and verified with memospark.live domain property. Property is active and accessible with data processing initiated, as confirmed by user's earlier screenshot showing the verified property in their Google Search Console dashboard. Foundational step completed enabling sitemap submission, URL inspection, and performance monitoring capabilities.

tasks.name: Submit Sitemap and Monitor Indexing Progress
tasks.description: Submit the fixed comprehensive sitemap.xml to Google Search Console and establish monitoring for indexing progress. Leverage existing AI-optimized sitemap structure with proper priorities for different page types.
tasks.notes: Sitemap has been fixed to remove custom AI namespace tags and now uses standard XML format that Google can properly parse. Contains 12 essential pages with proper priority structure.

relatedFiles.description: Fixed comprehensive sitemap with standard XML format, mobile markup, and proper priorities
Sitemap configuration with AI optimization and comprehensive robots.txt settings
Robots.txt file with sitemap reference and AI-friendly crawling directives

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Navigate to Sitemaps section in Google Search Console
2. Click Add a new sitemap and enter sitemap.xml
3. Submit and verify Success status appears
4. Monitor Discovered URLs count (should show ~12 pages)
5. Check Last read timestamp for processing confirmation
6. Navigate to Pages section to monitor indexed vs not indexed pages
7. Investigate any Excluded pages and document issues
8. Set up weekly monitoring schedule for indexing status
tasks.verificationCriteria: Sitemap successfully submitted with Success status in Google Search Console. All 12 pages discovered and processing. Indexing coverage report shows majority of pages indexed or being processed. Baseline metrics documented for ongoing comparison.
tasks.analysisResult: MemoSpark requires systematic SEO optimization to achieve Google search visibility and indexing. The application has sophisticated existing SEO infrastructure including AI-optimized sitemap configuration, comprehensive SEO components, structured data schemas, and advanced robots.txt. The plan focuses on completing critical setup phases, leveraging existing infrastructure, and implementing performance optimizations to achieve immediate indexing and long-term search visibility while maintaining excellent user experience.
tasks.summary: Successfully submitted sitemap to Google Search Console after fixing middleware authentication issue. Google is now discovering pages with 2 pages indexed and 14 pages in various processing states. Fixed the critical authentication barrier that was preventing search engine access. Need to address specific indexing issues including noindex tags and content optimization.

tasks.name: Request Priority Page Indexing Using URL Inspection Tool
tasks.description: Use Google Search Console's URL Inspection Tool to request immediate indexing of high-priority pages including homepage, about, contact, and sign-up pages. This accelerates discovery for conversion-critical pages.
tasks.notes: Priority order based on conversion potential and user journey importance. Request indexing quota is limited, so focus on most critical pages first. Monitor results over 7-14 days.

relatedFiles.description: Homepage with comprehensive SEO optimization and structured data
About page with AI-optimized meta tags and organization schema
Contact page with contact point structured data

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Access URL Inspection Tool in Google Search Console
2. Test and request indexing for priority pages in order:
   - https://www.memospark.live/ (homepage)
   - https://www.memospark.live/sign-up (conversion)
   - https://www.memospark.live/about (information)
   - https://www.memospark.live/contact (support)
   - https://www.memospark.live/dashboard (user engagement)
3. For each page: enter URL, click Test Live URL, then Request Indexing
4. Monitor status and document any issues found
5. Set up weekly check for indexing status of priority pages
6. Document any crawling or indexing errors for resolution
tasks.verificationCriteria: All 5 priority pages submitted for indexing via URL Inspection Tool. Request status confirmed for each page. Any crawling errors identified and documented. Follow-up monitoring schedule established for tracking indexing progress.
tasks.analysisResult: MemoSpark requires systematic SEO optimization to achieve Google search visibility and indexing. The application has sophisticated existing SEO infrastructure including AI-optimized sitemap configuration, comprehensive SEO components, structured data schemas, and advanced robots.txt. The plan focuses on completing critical setup phases, leveraging existing infrastructure, and implementing performance optimizations to achieve immediate indexing and long-term search visibility while maintaining excellent user experience.

tasks.name: Fix OpenGraph URL References and Update Domain Settings
tasks.description: Update OpenGraph URL references from old domain to current memospark.live domain across all pages. Fix any remaining references to study-spark-pi.vercel.app to ensure proper social media sharing and SEO signals.
tasks.notes: Critical for proper social media sharing and SEO authority signals. Incorrect URLs can split SEO value between domains and cause social sharing issues.

relatedFiles.description: Contains BASE_URL and OpenGraph configurations that may need domain updates
Structured data schemas with URL references that need domain verification
AI-optimized meta tag component for verifying URL generation

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Search codebase for old domain references: study-spark-pi.vercel.app
2. Update BASE_URL in seoConfig.ts if incorrect
3. Verify OpenGraph URL generation in all SEO components
4. Test social media sharing on Facebook and Twitter
5. Update any hardcoded URLs in structured data schemas
6. Verify canonical URLs are using correct domain
7. Update any external service configurations (analytics, etc.)
8. Test all updated pages with social media debugging tools
tasks.verificationCriteria: All OpenGraph URLs correctly reference memospark.live domain. Social media sharing shows correct URL and preview. No references to old domain found in codebase. Canonical URLs properly set for all pages. Social media debugging tools show correct metadata.
tasks.analysisResult: MemoSpark requires systematic SEO optimization to achieve Google search visibility and indexing. The application has sophisticated existing SEO infrastructure including AI-optimized sitemap configuration, comprehensive SEO components, structured data schemas, and advanced robots.txt. The plan focuses on completing critical setup phases, leveraging existing infrastructure, and implementing performance optimizations to achieve immediate indexing and long-term search visibility while maintaining excellent user experience.

tasks.name: Technical SEO Audit and Core Web Vitals Optimization
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive technical SEO audit focusing on Core Web Vitals optimization. Address LCP performance issue (currently 5.1s, target <2.5s) and optimize overall page performance for better search rankings.
tasks.notes: Core Web Vitals are Google ranking factors. Current LCP of 5.1s significantly impacts search rankings. Focus on image optimization and JavaScript performance first.

relatedFiles.description: Root layout for implementing performance optimizations like preloading
Next.js configuration for performance optimization settings
Initial SEO audit with performance baseline metrics and recommendations

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Run Lighthouse audit on key pages and document current metrics
2. Identify LCP optimization opportunities:
   - Optimize image loading and compression
   - Implement proper font loading strategies
   - Analyze and optimize JavaScript bundle sizes
   - Implement preloading for critical resources
3. Address CLS issues by reserving space for dynamic content
4. Optimize INP through efficient event handlers
5. Implement performance monitoring with Core Web Vitals tracking
6. Test mobile performance specifically
7. Document before/after performance metrics
8. Set up automated performance monitoring
tasks.verificationCriteria: Lighthouse performance score improved to 95+ on both desktop and mobile. LCP reduced to <2.5s on key pages. CLS and INP within good thresholds. Core Web Vitals monitoring implemented. Performance improvement documented with before/after metrics.
tasks.analysisResult: MemoSpark requires systematic SEO optimization to achieve Google search visibility and indexing. The application has sophisticated existing SEO infrastructure including AI-optimized sitemap configuration, comprehensive SEO components, structured data schemas, and advanced robots.txt. The plan focuses on completing critical setup phases, leveraging existing infrastructure, and implementing performance optimizations to achieve immediate indexing and long-term search visibility while maintaining excellent user experience.

tasks.name: Analytics Integration and Performance Monitoring Setup
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring system using Google Analytics 4, Search Console insights, and performance tracking tools to measure SEO success and identify optimization opportunities.
tasks.notes: Essential for measuring SEO success and identifying optimization opportunities. Integration between GA4 and Search Console provides comprehensive insights.

relatedFiles.description: Root layout for implementing Google Analytics tracking code
New directory for analytics utilities and configuration

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Set up Google Analytics 4 property for memospark.live
2. Install GA4 tracking code using Next.js best practices
3. Configure enhanced ecommerce and conversion tracking
4. Link Google Analytics to Search Console for integrated reporting
5. Set up Core Web Vitals monitoring in GA4
6. Create custom dashboards for SEO performance tracking
7. Configure automated alerts for traffic drops or technical issues
8. Set up monthly SEO performance reports
9. Document baseline metrics for ongoing comparison
tasks.verificationCriteria: Google Analytics 4 properly tracking all pages and user interactions. Search Console and GA4 successfully linked. Core Web Vitals data flowing to analytics. Custom SEO dashboards created and functional. Automated alerts configured. Baseline metrics documented for comparison.
tasks.analysisResult: MemoSpark requires systematic SEO optimization to achieve Google search visibility and indexing. The application has sophisticated existing SEO infrastructure including AI-optimized sitemap configuration, comprehensive SEO components, structured data schemas, and advanced robots.txt. The plan focuses on completing critical setup phases, leveraging existing infrastructure, and implementing performance optimizations to achieve immediate indexing and long-term search visibility while maintaining excellent user experience.

tasks.name: Content Strategy and Ongoing SEO Optimization Plan
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive content strategy and ongoing optimization plan to maintain and improve search visibility. Create processes for regular content updates, keyword monitoring, and continuous SEO improvements.
tasks.notes: Ongoing SEO requires consistent effort and monitoring. Focus on educational content that provides value to target audience while supporting SEO goals.

relatedFiles.description: SEO documentation directory for ongoing strategy documentation
New file for content strategy utilities and configuration

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Conduct keyword research for educational technology and AI study tools
2. Create content calendar for blog posts and feature announcements
3. Develop internal linking strategy to boost page authority
4. Plan FAQ section expansion based on user queries
5. Set up competitor monitoring and analysis
6. Create process for regular SEO audits (monthly)
7. Establish link building outreach strategy
8. Plan structured data expansion for rich snippets
9. Create SEO checklist for new feature launches
10. Document long-term SEO roadmap and goals
tasks.verificationCriteria: Comprehensive content strategy documented and approved. Keyword research completed with target keywords identified. Internal linking strategy implemented across key pages. Monthly SEO audit process established. Competitor monitoring system in place. Long-term SEO roadmap created with measurable goals and timeline.
